author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO ACCELERATE TOWARD BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO THE ISLAND WEDNESDAY EVENING...
summary: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO ACCELERATE TOWARD BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO THE ISLAND WEDNESDAY EVENING... As of 11:00 PM EDT Tue Sep 30 the center of Imelda was located near 29.7, -73.9 with movement ENE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 977 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
